pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["$r","strong",null,{"children":["注：该镜像是 pkgsrc 二进制包和 distfile 的镜像。本镜像站同时提供 pkgsrc 源码的镜像，请参考 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/pkgsrc.git/","children":"pkgsrc.git 镜像使用帮助"}],"。"]}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"二进制包使用","children":"二进制包使用"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"输入"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"echo {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/packages/NetBSD/<ARCH>/<VERSION>/All > $PKGDIR/etc/pkgin/repositories.conf","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["其中 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<ARCH>"}]," 和 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"<VERSION>"}]," 可选范围可参看以下链接"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/packages/NetBSD/"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["注意该镜像不包括 joyent 内容，即",["$r","code",null,{"children":"MacOS"}],"，",["$r","code",null,{"children":"SmartOS"}],"，",["$r","code",null,{"children":"Linux"}],"中二进制包。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"distfile-使用","children":"distfile 使用"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["如果想使用该镜像的 distfile 强制替换全部 distfile 的下载路径，编辑",["$r","code",null,{"children":"$PKGSRCDIR/mk/defaults/mk.conf"}],"，并添加"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"MASTER_SITE_BACKUP= {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/distfiles/
MASTER_SITE_OVERRIDE= {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/distfiles/
MASTER_SORT= .edu.cn .cn"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"若只是部分替代，可参考"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"MASTER_SITE_CYGWIN= https://mirror/cygwin/
MASTER_SITE_GNU= https://mirror/gnu/
MASTER_SITE_PERL_CPAN= https://mirror/CPAN/modules/by-module/
MASTER_SITE_TEX_CTAN= https://mirror/CTAN/
MASTER_SITE_BACKUP= {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/distfiles/
MASTER_SORT= .edu.cn .cn"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["其中非 pkgsrc 的变量可参考",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/cygwin/","children":" Cygwin 帮助"}],"，",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/gnu/","children":" GNU 帮助"}],"，",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/CPAN/","children":" CPAN 帮助"}],"，",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/CTAN/","children":"CTAN 帮助"}],"。"]}]]}]

meta.title: pkgsrc 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
